name: Portal A
tagline: CREATES ENTERTAINMENT FOR A NEW GENERATION
description:
PORTAL A is an award-winning digital studio that develops, produces, and distributes original and branded entertainment for a new generation. Here’s what drives us. The Internet has changed the way content is consumed. The power is with the audience – we choose what we watch, when we watch it, and can tune you out with a swipe of the finger.
But we’re still served a steady diet of Advertising, with a capital “A” – the beat-you-over-the-head, interruptive sales pitch that momentarily distracts from what you actually want to see. At PORTAL A, we partner with innovative brands and collaborate with a new generation of talent, dedicating ourselves to a single mission: inspire a modern audience with premium entertainment.
